publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7407 Robert Brown: Keeping Family Links in Prison—That the Parliament notes the importance of family links to cutting reoffending; considers that the project run by Circle at Addiewell Prison has been successful in reducing reoffending to 30% and in cutting drug and alcohol dependence; further notes the importance of family and child contact to motivating prisoners for a successful release, and urges the Scottish Government to extend the project to other Scottish prisons.
S3M-7407 Keeping Family Links in Prison (lodged on 15 November 2010) Mike Pringle*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Trish Godman*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Angela Constance*
S3M-7407 Keeping Family Links in Prison (lodged on 15 November 2010) Alison McInnes*, Dr Richard Simpson*
